alert.note: Alert for Mahoning (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 07 at 10:50AM EST until March 08 at 8:30PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Ohio, including the following counties, Mahoning and Trumbull. * WHEN...Until 600 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1050 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 2 inches of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.25 to 0.5 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Youngstown, Warren, Boardman, Niles, Campbell, Hubbard, Canfield, Newton Falls, Lordstown, Hilltop, Maplewood Park, Vienna Center, Leavittsburg, Austintown, Struthers, Girard, Vienna, McDonald, Poland and Ellsworth. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
